Ingredients.1: 1.0 cups chicken stock, or as needed, divided

Ingredients.9: 1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste

Ingredients.10: 1 pinch dried thyme, or to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 teaspoon ancho chile powder, or to taste

Ingredients.13: 12 ounces uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Heat 2 cups chicken stock and half-and-half until nearly boiling. Add polenta and stir constantly until no clumps remain, 3 to 4 minutes. Reduce heat and simmer until tender and thickened, 20 to 30 minutes. Add additional stock or water if polenta is too thick.

Directions.2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, and garlic. Saute for 3 to 5 minutes. Add 1/2 cup chicken stock, oregano, thyme, and ancho chile powder. Simmer until vegetables reach desired texture, 3 to 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Meanwhile, stir Parmesan cheese into the polenta. Add shrimp to the vegetable mixture; cook until pink and heated through, 3 to 5 minutes more. Spoon polenta onto serving plates and top with shrimp mixture.
